name: Mini Ultimate Reset Repairing Night Serum for Damaged Hair
about: What it is: A multi-benefit night serum that strengthens, hydrates, and protects from breakage while you sleep for smooth, shiny results by morning...Hair Type: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Texture: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage.- Dryness.- Frizz..Key Benefits: - Cares for damaged hair overnight due to bleaching, coloring, and heat styling.- Intensely hydrates to restore hair's strength and increase smoothness and shine.- In one use, helps fight up to one year of visible surface damage on hair..Highlighted Ingredients:- Japanese-Sourced Rice Extract: Enriched with minerals, antioxidants, vitamins B and E, it is renowned by Japanese women for protecting hair from damage, hydrating, and improving elasticity..- Peptides: Easily penetrates the hair follicle to increase moisture and restore strength..What Else You Need to Know: Enhance your nighttime routine with this luxurious, multi-benefit overnight hair treatment that thoroughly cares for damaged hair by restoring strength, smoothness, and shine. Infused with a fusion technology of Japanese-sourced rice extract and peptides, this unique hair serum works to target damage caused by bleach, color, chemical services, and heat styling. It leaves the hair soft, supple, and with added strength by morning and provides benefits lasting throughout the day...Clinical Results:.-Reduces hair breakage by 95%*.-3X smoother hair*.-95% stronger hair*.-In one use, helps fight up to 1 year of visible surface damage on hair.-Softens and nourishes hair.-Provides hydration and shine.*when compared to non-conditioning shampoo..Fragrance Description: Top notes of peach and orange blossom blend with middle notes of jasmine, geranium, and ylang ylang, with base notes of tonka bean, sandalwood, vanilla, and musk.
ingredients: -Japanese-Sourced Rice Extract: Enriched with minerals, antioxidants, vitamins B and E, it is renowned by Japanese women for protecting hair from damage, hydrating, and improving elasticity..-Peptides: Easily penetrates the hair follicle to increase moisture and restore strength...Aqua/Water/Eau, Dimethicone, Cetearyl Alcohol, Amodimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Polyquaternium-37, Dimethiconol, Trideceth-5, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Steareth-20, Caprylyl Glycol, Cetyl Hydroxyethylcellulose, Glycerin, Citric Acid, Ppg-1 Trideceth-6, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Trideceth-10, Sodium Hydroxide, Acrylates/Stearyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Sorbitan Oleate, Acetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, 2-Oleamido-1,3-Octadecanediol, Hydrated Silica, Safflower Glucoside, Linalool, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Disodium Phosphate, Isoeugenol, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Phosphate, Benzyl Benzoate, Edta, Hydrolyzed Rice Extract, Tocopherol, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-9, Sodium Citrate, Parfum/Fragrance.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Before bed, apply to dry or damp mid-lengths and ends (two to four pumps for fine to medium hair or four to six for medium to thick hair)..-In the morning do not rinseu2014style as usual..-Use two to three times per week or as desired....Pro tip:.-After applying through mid-lengths and ends, put hair in a topknot wrapped with silk scrunchie for ultimate protection and soft waves in the morning.
